Text: Catching up and asking a favorHow is everything going with you all Things are pretty good here Expecting a second baby in March Pretty excited How are Ashly and Jackson Good I hope What is Jackson now almost I bet hes alot of fun I was also writing to ask you if you know anything about the program Enron has for people with graduate degrees Chris is furiously looking for a new job and was just curious about that program that he saw on the Enron web site I was also going to ask you if you knew of any positions there that might suit Chris qualifications Alot of what he sees on the web is looking for alot of engineering or Oil Gas experience I told him you might have an inside track on some things there and that I would check with you I am attaching his resume for you to look at If you know of anything please give me a call or email me I would certainly appreciate it Take care and keep in touch Amanda Chris DeVries Resumedoc
